price: If the disbelievers were to fight you, they would surely turn their backs, then they would not have any protector or helper.
arabic: وَلَوۡ قَٰتَلَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوَلَّوُاْ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
